DOC.brief_summary: Retrospective medical chart and medical imaging file review of patients suffering from palsy of the superior rectus extraocular muscle
DOC.brief_title: Study of Ocular Torsion in Patients Suffering From Palsy of the Superior Rectus Extraocular Muscle
DOC.criteria: Patient with unilateral muscular palsy of the superior rectus muscle Patient must have a binocular vision as characterized by Lang test bilateral impairment of the superior rectus muscle presence of an orbital lesion (orbital trauma, tumor or pseudotumor) thyroid orbitopathy No binovular vision
